title: Smouldering lava deposits scattered across Hawaii's Big Island
text:
Smouldering lava deposits scattered across Hawaii's Big Island 9:10am EDT - 02:10
Emergency crews said they were poised to evacuate more people as fissures kept spreading from Hawaii’s erupting Kilauea volcano, five days after it started exploding. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Emergency crews said they were poised to evacuate more people as fissures kept spreading from Hawaii’s erupting Kilauea volcano, five days after it started exploding. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KOnAfA
